properties.title: Volcanic monItoring using SenTinel sensors by an integrated Approach (VISTA)
properties.description: Development of a novel ensemble of algorithms to completely characterized the effects of volcanic emissions on land and atmosphere. The expected outcomes of the project are improvements in satellite volcanic ash/ice/water vapour particles/SO2 cloud detection and retrievals (altitude, extension, mass, concentration, aerosol optical depth and effective radius), the development of a specific ML based algorithm to map the presence of ash deposits over land and the generation of new satellite-based prototypal services.
properties.osc:consortium: GEO-K SRL (IT),AIRES TECH PLC (GB),ISTITUTO NAZIONALE DI GEOFISICA E VULCANOLOGIA (IT)
